content: "Kabbalah Quest - The Tree of Life Journey" is an interactive text-based game that follows the story of a spiritual seeker, Rachel, on a journey through ten realms representing the sefirot of the Tree of Life to stop a dark force from destroying the multiverse. Each realm represents a different aspect of spiritual attainment, such as wisdom, understanding, and balance, and Rachel must confront her own obstacles and fears to progress. Players will encounter various allies and enemies, learn about the interconnectedness of all things, and make choices that will affect the outcome of the story and shape their own unique experience. The game will feature art that will reflect the different realms.
